title: Wear Apps Tracker
summary: The smart way to manage your wearable apps.
description: When you install an app on your phone it's easy to understand what's happening: you've got notifications and confirmation screens. The same is not true for your Android Wear device: after installing the app on the phone you just have to wait for the magic to happen, opening and closing the Start... menu until the epiphany occurs bringing the new icon on the list.Not anymore! With Wear Apps Tracker you'll get a notification on your Android Wear device stream every time you install, remove or update an app for your smartwatch.Plus, a simple wearable apps manager as a handheld app companion.★Features✓ Material inspired / #materyolo✓ Get a notification on your Android Wear device stream every time you install, remove or update an app for your smartwatch.✓ Open the handheld companion app to get a list of every third party apps installed on your Android Wear device✓ Tap on the rows of the App List to go straight to the relative Setting screen and manage the App; pull the list to refresh it✓ Open the handheld companion app to turn on/off the notification cards for specific events: new installations, upgrades, removals.Please NOTE: You must start Wear Apps Tracker on the watch once it's installed. It's required just one time after the first installation.★Featured on✓Android Police http://goo.gl/wGmJVJ - http://goo.gl/88odcb - http://goo.gl/HzNKAi✓ phoneArena http://goo.gl/LQZGzP✓ TuttoAndroid http://goo.gl/MKsLxL - AndroidWorld.it http://goo.gl/aQWMNi★Finalist app at AppCircus San Francisco 2014 http://goo.gl/Fb6rTr★Permissions✓ Run at startup: just to clean any data mess potentially caused by a brute shutdown of the wearable device. The app is still in development, so please expect future improvements|
descriptionHTML:
When you install an app on your phone it's easy to understand what's happening: you've got notifications and confirmation screens. The same is not true for your Android Wear device: after installing the app on the phone you just have to wait for the magic to happen, opening and closing the Start... menu until the epiphany occurs bringing the new icon on the list.

Not anymore! With Wear Apps Tracker you'll get a notification on your Android Wear device stream every time you install, remove or update an app for your smartwatch.
Plus, a simple wearable apps manager as a handheld app companion.

★Features
✓ Material inspired / #materyolo
✓ Get a notification on your Android Wear device stream every time you install, remove or update an app for your smartwatch.
✓ Open the handheld companion app to get a list of every third party apps installed on your Android Wear device
✓ Tap on the rows of the App List to go straight to the relative Setting screen and manage the App; pull the list to refresh it
✓ Open the handheld companion app to turn on/off the notification cards for specific events: new installations, upgrades, removals.

Please NOTE: You must start Wear Apps Tracker on the watch once it's installed. It's required just one time after the first installation.

★Featured on
✓Android Police http://goo.gl/wGmJVJ - http://goo.gl/88odcb - http://goo.gl/HzNKAi
✓ phoneArena http://goo.gl/LQZGzP
✓ TuttoAndroid http://goo.gl/MKsLxL - AndroidWorld.it http://goo.gl/aQWMNi

★Finalist app at AppCircus San Francisco 2014 http://goo.gl/Fb6rTr

★Permissions
✓ Run at startup: just to clean any data mess potentially caused by a brute shutdown of the wearable device.


The app is still in development, so please expect future improvements|
comments: Doesn't work Hasn't loaded anything. Just says nothing on my watch. Would like for it to actually work
Seems okay But unfortunately, all I get when using it is a message saying that "No apps are installed".  I have several installed; so the app isn't working for me.
Useful, but a bit frustrating...  Why, when an app is removed, doesn't it say -which- app got removed...?
Perfect Excellent works as described. @ Erik make sure your watch is connected to your phone. Otherwise you will get "no apps installed" message
Very useful. Nice to have on my watch letting me stay up to date without having to check my phone.
Perfect ! Perfect app for separating Android Wear apps and my regular phone apps , so i can uninstall apps safely
recentChanges: - Handheld main screen is now titled "My Wearable Apps"
